BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Remove ESQL INLINESTATS from changelog (#118629) ESQL's INLINESTATS is still experimental and not being released with 8.16. I was too excited when I wrote it and marked it as a feature. But it's not released, so not really a feature.
